resources.string: Wipe and locate on receipt of signed SMS

For its basic functionality, the app needs the permissions to receive and read incoming SMS.
Accept incoming commands to locate the device and respond with its current location.
To enable GPS without user interaction, the app must be device admin and device owner. Please have a look at the readme how to achieve the latter.
Accept incoming commands to wipe (factory reset) the device.
